name: Lonestar (itch)
description:
Lonestar - Deluxe Edition is a PC port of our mobile game.

It is the near future, you are a bounty hunter on a mission to save the world, shoot your way trough enemies in differently themed stages like it's 1990!

In contrast to the mobile version, the PC deluxe edition contains:

-Keyboard & Mouse / Gamepad support (Xbox 360 controller tested)

-Optional TV scanlines effect setting to emulate CRT

-New GUI that supports gamepad navigation

-All ads have been removed
